subtitle: An impressive dish for entertaining, whether as a starter served with wholemeal toast, or as part of a buffet for larger numbers.

method.text: Dissolve the gelatine in the fish stock.
Line individual ramekin dishes with the smoked salmon, leaving enough salmon overlapping the edges to fold over the top of the mousse and enclose.
To make the avocado mousse: Puree the avocado with the lemon juice and sherry until smooth. Set aside in a bowl.
For the salmon mousse: Simply puree the salmon until smooth. Place in a second bowl.
For the spinach mousse: Puree the spinach with the nutmeg until smooth. Place in a third bowl.
Fold one third of the cream and one third of the gelatine into each of the three bowls.
Spoon the contents of each bowl carefully into the prepared ramekins, forming three layers. Fold over the slices of salmon to enclose each individual mousse. Chill for 1-1 days until firm.
Turn out onto a serving plate. Serve well chilled.

title: Salmon, spinach and avocado mousse
